meaning_str.bing:
adj. 纯的；纯净的；纯粹的；干净的
网络. 纯洁；纯洁的

纯的；纯净的；纯粹的；干净的

纯的；不掺杂质的；血统纯的；纯种的；纯真的；贞洁的；干净的；不含有害物质的；无杂色的；完全的；纯粹的；（科学或研究）纯理论的；抽象的；（元音）单音的；纯音的

1.en: Free to pursue liberty as a matter of pure principle, Nozick let nothing stand in his way.
1.cn: Nozick确保无拘束的去追求自由可以作为一种纯粹的原则所存在。

2.en: Rev22: 1 And he shewed me a pure river of water of life, clear as crystal, proceeding out of the throne of God and of the Lamb.
2.cn: Rev22：1天使又指示我在城内街道当中一道生命水的河，明亮如水晶，从神和羔羊的宝座流出来。

3.en: Zeng Gong was a pure Confucianism, he inclined to inherit, and the heart of his thought was the transformation through instruction.
3.cn: 比较而言，曾巩是位纯正的儒家，他的经学思想是以教化为中心的，重在继承；

0.en: From the pure economic perspective, you can think all of these is irrational.
0.cn: 从单纯的经济学角度，你可以认为这些都是荒谬的。

1.en: Scientifically known 3,4-methylenedioxy-N-methylamphetamine, MDMA is usually taken in pill form and supposed to be composed of the pure chemical.
1.cn: 科学上来说，摇头丸的组成是亚甲二氧甲基苯丙胺，通常和很纯的化学药品一起制成药丸。

2.en: That's pure yin and yang. That's pure Hong Kong.
2.cn: 这就是阴阳调和的精髓。这就是香港。

3.en: So the foundation is pure concrete and sand, no metal.
3.cn: 所以是用混凝土和沙石搭建的，不含金属物质。

4.en: You're going to tell the truth, Mycroft. Pure and simple.
4.cn: 你要告诉我们真相，麦考夫，就这么纯粹简单。

5.en: Mockingjay, may your aim be as true as your heart is pure.
5.cn: 嘲笑鸟，愿你的心有多纯，箭便有多准。

6.en: But Daddy Coach, you've got a big tummy. This tummy is pure muscle.
6.cn: 可是教练爸爸，你有一个大大的肚子。这个肚子可全都是肌肉。

7.en: In it's pure form, MDMA affects the neurotransmitters in your brain.
7.cn: 高纯度的摇头丸，会影响脑中的神经传递介质。

8.en: And, if their genetic code was pure, many of them would look quite different.
8.cn: 还有，如果她们的基因序列没有被改动，许多恐龙看上去会很不一样。

9.en: Not to be confused with the French Fry Goodness Inventory. That's pure Cooper.
9.cn: 不要和炸薯条好坏问卷搞混了，那个是我库珀的大作。

10.en: No offense, but this is pure 100% Nimoy. Because of your mother, you're only 50%.
10.cn: 无意冒犯，但这可是100%纯尼莫伊，而因为你妈，你只有50%的种。

11.en: Those early years were glorious. No guests, no board meetings, just pure creation.
11.cn: 早年的那些光辉岁月，没有游客和无聊会议，只有单纯地创造。

12.en: Who was it said, "The truth is rarely pure and never simple"? I don't know and I don't care.
12.cn: 是谁说的“相鲜有纯粹，也绝不简单”？不知道也不在乎。

13.en: Well, I spent most of the afternoon growing isotopically pure crystals for neutrino detection.
13.cn: 我整个下午都忙着在生成同位素纯水晶来探测微中子。

14.en: He believed magical learning should be kept within all-magic families. In other words, pure-bloods.
14.cn: 他相信只有魔法家庭的子弟才能学习魔法。也就是说要血统纯正。

15.en: Unbleached, nothing unnatural in it. Just the pure wholemeal flour. A beautiful thing. It's lovely.
15.cn: 没有漂白，全天然的，真正的全麦面粉，多好的东西，很棒。

16.en: There are gems in the mountain that I too desire. White gems of pure starlight. I offer you my help.
16.cn: 山中众多宝石，我也觊觎已久，白色的宝石，如同纯洁的星光，我可以帮你。

17.en: Let me tell you something. Everything you hear at a poker game is pure crap. Nice earrings. Thank you.
17.cn: 告诉你们，玩牌听到的每个字都是狗屁。不错的耳环。谢…

18.en: You know we should probably ask the doctor if she even knows how to deliver a baby that's half human and half pure evil.
18.cn: 我们应该问医生，她知不知道怎么接生半人半恶魔的孩子。

19.en: No, Peppa. This tummy is pure muscle. And so, George was born. And Granny and Grandpa gave George a very special present.
19.cn: 不是的，佩奇，我的肚子全部是肌肉。然后，乔治就出生了。猪爷爷和猪奶奶给乔治一个非常特别的礼物。
